name: Escape Shark Attack
description:
Simple game but it is very hard to get high score.
- There are 4 Mode to Play:
+ Flapp Mode: Tap to Jump the Fish though tunnel
+ Swing Mode: Tap to make fish swim as the wave and across impediments
+ Flapp Piano: Play Flapp with Piano
+ Swing Piano: Play Swing with Piano
*** Try To Get Higher Score to unlock all Music Song
Note: - Try to avoid starfishs, anchors and the boundary of the aquarium or fish will be death.
- Fish swimming movements are gentle and similar to reality
- the higher level, the harder to play
- Ip fish is die, the shark will goto eat him immediately
Hope you have fun and Please rate and share if you like my game.
Thank you very much!
